entries.journal_entry_description: Raine Taske is trying to improve his crafting. First, help him make clothing.
entries.journal_entry_title: Sharing the Art of Crafting: Clothing
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Use your Generic Crafting Tool to make a pair of Casual Pants for Raine. Casual Pants require Metal and the chemical Fiberplast.  To use the crafting tool: Double-click on the generic crafting tool in your inventory. Double-click on the schematic that you wish to use.  Double-click on the appropriate resources. Only resources that you can use will be available. Once you decide what resources to use, press the Assemble button. Press Yes to confirm that you want to make the item. If you cancel after this point, you lose the resources. You will see how successful the item is. Press Next to continue. Press Create Object to complete the item.  Press Yes to confirm. The item will be complete in a few seconds.
entries.task00_journal_entry_title: Create a pair of Casual Pants
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Now that you have fulfilled his request, show Raine your work and get your payment.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Talk to Raine in Hangar Bay 2
